name: Ashin
description:
'''Chen Hsin-hung''' ({{zh|t=陳信宏|p=Chén Xìnhóng|poj=Tân Sìn-hông}}), nicknamed '''Ashin''' ({{zh|c=阿信|p=Āxìn}}) (born 6 December 1975), is a Taiwanese singer and songwriter. He is best known as the vocalist of the rock band [[Mayday (Taiwanese band)|Mayday]]. When Ashin majored in art in college, he began his musical career.

He is also the founder and designer of the clothing line StayReal and a shareholder of the music label [[B'in Music]]. He was elected as a board member of the [[Taiwan Public Television Service]] in 2013.
